generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved street with cars parked along its side and a visible road surface extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: A paved pedestrian walkway is visible along the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and adjacent to buildings.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings line both sides of the street, featuring windows, doors, and architectural details typical of urban structures.
- pole: A vertical pole with traffic signs attached is visible on the right side of the sidewalk.
- traffic sign: A circular "No Parking" sign and a rectangular "Anlieger - frei" (Residents - free) sign are mounted on the pole.
- vegetation: Flower boxes with plants are visible hanging from windowsills on the buildings along the street.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast and gray.
- person: Three individuals are walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the street.
- car: Several cars are parked along the side of the road, including a black sedan in the foreground and a black SUV further down the street.
